summary: This document is an email chain from December 3, 2019, where a Norwegian journalist, Runa Fjellanger, contacts the FBI's National Press Office on behalf of VG newspaper. She inquires about a quote attributed to an anonymous FBI agent regarding the FBI's interest in speaking with an unnamed individual (redacted) who traveled on Jeffrey Epstein's private jet, and asks about potential FBI contact with Norwegian authorities concerning Epstein and Crown Princess Mette-Marit.

persons.name: Runa Fjellanger
persons.context: Norwegian journalist contacting the FBI on behalf of VG newspaper to inquire about the FBI's interest in an individual connected to Jeffrey Epstein and potential contacts with Norwegian authorities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the FBI investigation; the inquiry concerns individuals who traveled on his private jet and potential contacts with Norwegian authorities.

persons.name: Crown Princess Mette-Marit
persons.context: Mentioned in the journalist's inquiry regarding whether the FBI or other American agencies have had contact with Norwegian authorities concerning her in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Journalist Inquiry to FBI
events.description: Runa Fjellanger, a journalist for VG newspaper, emails the FBI's National Press Office with questions about the FBI's interest in an unnamed individual connected to Jeffrey Epstein and potential contacts with Norwegian authorities.

keyFacts: A Norwegian journalist is seeking confirmation and details about a quote attributed to an anonymous FBI agent stating the FBI wants to speak with an unnamed individual connected to Jeffrey Epstein.
The inquiry references flight logs indicating the unnamed individual traveled on Jeffrey Epstein's private jet multiple times.
The journalist asks if the FBI has contacted Norwegian authorities, including the Police Security Service, regarding Jeffrey Epstein or Crown Princess Mette-Marit.
The document highlights international media and law enforcement interest in Epstein's network following his death in August 2019.
